content: the coziest hideaway for your feline or little canine buddy we designed this to be a 2 x 50-yard tough love ball project but feel free to add another ball to size it up for that larger cat in your life level basic crochet finished measurements 17 diameter x 8 5 tall materials 2 x 50-yard balls of tough love or tough love stripe yarn shown in guava size u 25mm crochet hook stitch marker
